website_summaries.verdict: These 300-count garlic-based tablets are loaded with coat-enhancing minerals, promote skin health, are affordable, and make your cat unappealing to biting fleas and ticks. An all-around good deal.
pros: Garlic, brewer’s yeast, and iron included for coat health
cons: It is possible for pets to overdose on garlic, so feed this supplement to your cat as directed on the packaging

customer_reviews.title: These pills really do work!
customer_reviews.text: I about lost my little Chorkie, Bella last year due to flea infestation. I bathed her, gave her oral treatments and still the fleas clung to her. Had to take her to the vet for emergency treatment. Her gums had turned white, she was lethargic and wouldn't eat. I about lost my baby!! So, this year I found these garlic pills and started giving them to her because she was getting fleas again. Let me tell you, once these babies get into her system, they started making their way to the end of her hair and eventually jumped off of her. She is flea free!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Williams

customer_reviews.title: I do not like to do reviews normally but I have to say ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not like to do reviews normally but I have to say that this natural remedy for fleas has truly worked. Our outside dog was loaded with fleas. We bathed her, treated her, treated the yard and nothing seemed to work at all. She had them so bad that her tail was black with fleas....Now she is flea free and a very happy dog. I would recommend these to anyone having trouble with fleas. I do not know about the ticks because we dont normally have issues with them. Hope this helps...
customer_reviews.author: kellie steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my boys have been using this product for 4yrs. never a flea or tick !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: appreciate the finer things

customer_reviews.title: Good product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about a week now. I have three dogs (two small, one large), and two cats. All five animals have taken these pills once a day...with no problems. Some reviews have stated that cats don't like them. Mine have had no issues. I just put the pill(s) on top of all the pets food...and always eaten. I do not know yet how it helps kill fleas. I assume it will take a bit of time to build up in their system...like most medication does. So...time will tell on that. But so far...no issues at all with product.
customer_reviews.author: Keifers

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This one, my dog and I swear by. This was recommended to us by a dog trainer who is all about natural dog care. My dog has never had fleas but I’m sure this has been key to keeping it that way. My baby weighs 53 lbs I give her two tablets daily in peanut butter and that’s it. You get 500 in a bottle which lasts forever and so it is very well worth it. I wonder if they have any supplements like this for heart health.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: It's been a couple of weeks since I started giving this to my daughter's short haired dachshund and no more itching or scratching. He never got fleas but all our neighbors started getting fleas on their dogs and I saw him scratching so this is more of a preventative.I did start the first two days with two pills instead of one. I do have to hide the pill with some Easy Cheese or anything else he likes to eat, somehow he smells it if it's not well hidden. He even smells like a neutral smell, he usually gets groomed once a month. Will continue to use on him.
customer_reviews.author: Letyfrmdablok

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give this stuff a try and honestly haven't seen any positive results. Was looking for a natural alternative to the chemical-laced products used to keep fleas away. But after several weeks at a very high dosage -- bottle says you can double up in the summer months -- my dog was still scratching like crazy. I had to resort back to the chemicals. The product also lists some benefit for your dog's coat. I haven't seen any benefit on that end either. This being said, I'm still putting these pills in my dog's food bowl with the hope that it delivers some sort of positive result.
customer_reviews.author: Davidoff

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Flea season is now here BUT not on our doggie! Thank God for this natural product. Best results work when given to your doggie BEFORE flea season starts and her coat ( Layla, Pitbull) is so shiny and pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Dog won't eat them☹️ Not working after a month of using
customer_reviews.text: My 5lb Shorkie won't eat them. He was taking a different Brewers yeast chewable tablet for several months before I tried this one and he ate it every day without an issue. Maybe it's the garlic smell! I have cut the pill in half to introduce it to him but he isn't taking it willingly. I chose this brand because the reviews said it was a natural flea defense. After a month of taking this product my Shorkie still has fleas. He has been taking 1 pill every morning disguised with another moist dog treat..I wish I was getting the results that other reviewers were getting!!! So very desperate for a natural flea defense😞
customer_reviews.author: Terrie S

customer_reviews.title: Can't get my dogs to eat them.
customer_reviews.text: I used to purchase Four Paws brewer's yeast and garlic tabs for my pups but they were unavailable when i needed to order so I tried these. My pups hate them. If I don't crush them, they will eat all their food around it and leave the tablet. If I crush them, #1-it's nearly impossible because they are so hard, and #2 the pups won't eat any of their food. I've tried putting them innpeanut butter and cheese, to no avail. Something in these makes them undesirable for my dogs so I'm going to have to throw them out and wait for the Four Paws to restock.
customer_reviews.author: Loriedoll

customer_reviews.title: So far so good , itcworks well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dogs since we live in hot humid weather, and fleas and ticks can be rampant. I break it up into a powder, and put it in my dogs food. They're not crazy about the scent or taste but they do eat it( I usually throw in something else to mask it incase.) so far, so good, have had no more bugs On my pets ( I don't do conventional, so finding something that works natural is important.)
customer_reviews.author: wilda berrios

customer_reviews.title: Keeps away ticks
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it and she has not had a tick on her body all summer long so far. And we have tons of ticks in our yard. These really does help repelling ticks from going on her which is great because she had Lyme disease last year and I don’t want to have to go through that treatment again- and yes she had the Lyme vaccine and still got it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Use daily
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving my dogs these garlic pills for years. Never a flea on any of them. So much cheaper than the chemicals the vet suggests. My vet told me dogs should not eat garlic, but this processed garlic is not like eating fresh garlic. My dogs have never had any issues whatsoever. Once in a blue moon one will have a tick, but we live in Tennessee so without these pills my dogs would be covered in ticks. Protection does take a couple of weeks to build up, it isn't instantaneous. The bonus is their glossy coats and they love the garlic pills.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby4

customer_reviews.title: Great Results
customer_reviews.text: Stopped Frontline to use Pet Brewer's Yeast only. My dog had 2 ticks recently but they seemed to be not alive anymore and were easy to remove (with head). With Frontline previously they'd be very stubborn and hard to remove. So I'm convinced that yeast and garlic are a perfect enemy for these pests.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Alper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving these to my dogs for a little over a month now and I do not see any fleas on them. I have three dogs and one of them doesn't like the taste so I hide it in cheese. I recommend this, it makes their coats shiny as well.
customer_reviews.author: bratcat74

customer_reviews.title: GREATEST THING EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I RECEIVED MY BREWERS YEAST TABS AND STARTED MY CAT ON THEM MONDAY NIGHT AND BY WED A.M. THERE WERE DEAD FLEAS ALL OVER THE PLACE. I PUT A NEW COLLAR ON HER ON TUESDAY AFTERNOON SO BETWEEN THE TABLETS AND THE COLLAR WE ARE HAVING A FLEA FUNERAL........I WILL BE ORDERING THESE AGAIN......THANK YOU..
customer_reviews.author: V. Spina

customer_reviews.title: been using on my dogs doesn't advertise the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: been using on my dogs doesn't advertise the fact that it kills fleas gets n their bloodstream and when they get bit the fleas croak without laying eggs this is also hard to find in pet or farm stores
customer_reviews.author: dorothy aspegren

customer_reviews.title: Great natural alternative
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as natural alternative to giving my dogs flea & tick medicine, as i had a senior dog pass from seizures related to what Vet normally recommends. These were recommended by family member that has used and swears by them for effectiveness and natural alternative. Im hoping these work for my pups and i grind them up and sprinkle on food, so far so good havent seen any flea or ticks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This really works on my two 3 year old Chihuahuas. Flea season is Texas is crazy,my little one was constantly biting and itching non stop and I refuse to give a monthly poison flea prevention pill. I was using an essential oil blend on their coats which smelled pretty harsh if you apply too much. But a week after crushing 1 pill into their meal toppers and feeding them (they will not chew the pills) no more crazy itching. We are about 1 month in but so far so good. I will be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Evee E

customer_reviews.title: They simply work and are completely non toxic unlike the ones from pharmaceutical companies!
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 Cavalier King Charles dogs. While we didn’t exactly have a flea infestation our dogs would pick up fleas outside from the rabbits and bring them in. Since we started them on these little tablets we haven’t seen a flea on them and I’ve not needed to spray Cedarcide on their bedding anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Cats would't touch it
customer_reviews.text: I had bought yeast tablets many years ago for another cat and she loved them. Since I couldn't find the same ones I tried these and the cats I have now wouldn't go near them- they didn't even recognize them as food, they just looked at them like "what's this pebble you've put in front of us?". I'm going to donate them to our local animal shelter and maybe one of the pets there will like them.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: I love it! My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got two pit bull puppies. I’d previously used advantage flea Med. Approximately, one week prior to reapplying, the fleas would return. I tried this product, pet brewers yeast and garlic, I give my puppies only two pills with peanut butter. No more advantage, just the brewers yeast and garlic pills. Not a flea or tick, the scratching is also reduced by 90%. I love it! My dogs love it! Thank you! Absolutely 5 star!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: 5 star quality product...but giving 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a few weeks now: 1) My pooch really likes them (other brands not so much) 2) She is 62 lbs so I appreciate only having to give her 3 pills a day 3) Pooches coat is shiny and healthy...No fleas. Here's my only negative: I picked these up as part of a lightning deal and now the price has nearly doubled. Amazon sells other alternatives out there so I'm watching reviews on other brands as I'm considering what to try next.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We live in Florida which seems like the flea capital and my 3 dogs have been ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the pills today and handed them out immediately. We live in Florida which seems like the flea capital and my 3 dogs have been suffering due to the mold winter we had. I also wanted to get away from harsh chemicals as 2 of my dogs are over 12. Within 4 hours after their dose the itching was reduced by 50-%- unbelievable! I will right a full review after a month. Also the dogs loved the taste. This is the first pill they have ever taken without having to hide it in good. So far so good- will keep you updated'''''
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: My chihuahua has been getting one pill a day for ...
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua has been getting one pill a day for a couple of weeks now, and it has gotten rid of all his fleas. He is an inside dog, using puppy pads, and his only experience with outside is going on the porch which is the main reason I needed these. My porch is 7 ft. off of the ground and he got fleas. There are a lot of cats roaming around my neighborhood and the only way he could get fleas is from the porch. Now he can go on the porch and not get bitten by fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work great to control fleas and ticks.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs do not have any fleas or ticks since I have been giving them these pills everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Lily and Yoda’s Funny Farm

customer_reviews.title: My dogs and cat say no way!
customer_reviews.text: 2 dogs 1 cat. All have always loved our previous brand. So much so that sometimes I could drop them on the floor like treats and they’d all three eat them. However this brand they want nothing to do it and if I mix it in their food they pick it out and put it on the floor. Pretty disappointing my dogs are not picky my cat doesn’t seem to be either but they are not happy with this product and they give it a thumbs down!
customer_reviews.author: Lv73

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart when you try to cut them
customer_reviews.text: it's too soon to know if these work for fleas but I do know they are not really suitable for cats because even though the pills are not big, it says to give cats half a dose and they're impossible to cut. They just crumble apart. It would be nice if the company would either make a smaller size for cats or at least score them so you'd have a shot at being able to cut them. I'm wasting half of every pill. Probably a good size for dogs though.
customer_reviews.author: Rapunzel

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and so far the pets are eating it right up. I crush up the pills and put it in their food every day. Two of the five are allergic to fleas so topical treatment hasn't been working well. I am hoping this remedy will be exactly what we are looking for to keep our babies happy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Alayna

customer_reviews.title: Did not prevent fleas
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are mostly indoor, we live in Florida and it's hot, so not a lot of out door time. I have 2 dogs, one small 20 lbs. (1 pill per day). and one medium at 60 lbs. (3 pills per day) They have been taking the pills for almost 2 months and I can tell you that it does not prevent fleas, but it did make their coats very health, smooth, reduced shedding. I will continue to use and might up it by one pill each just to see if that will make a difference repelling the fleas
customer_reviews.author: Sherry B

customer_reviews.title: This did not work for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this product. I have two 40 lbs dogs and I doubled the dose as recommended. I have had no results. I am 3/4's of the way through the bottle. Still have fleas. My dogs have no problem eating them. I will finish out the bottle. I also regularly comb out my dogs. I will update my review if things change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: This has eliminated fleas more so than any chemical treatment. I use this daily with natural flea spray from Walmart that has no chemicals and haven't had any flea or tick with combination for 3 years . The garlic in this prevents mosquitos that cause heartworm and fleas . The spray I buy has clove and natural oils that keep ticks off our dogs
customer_reviews.author: bella93:0)

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: We've given our Flat Coated Retriever a daily regimen of three pills for years, and she has never gotten fleas. She still gets a few ticks each spring, but we live in the woods. She eats them readily with her other morning treats.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Smell but do the Job
customer_reviews.text: My cousin recommended these after my dog was full of fleas, as well as my cat. After a few weeks of giving it to them the fleas are completely gone. The pills smell bad but both cat and dog love eating them just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: once we got our animals treated for fleas, we gave them these to keep them off, it worked, forgot them for a week on vaction and we had to retreat for fleas a couple days after we got home, my dogs and cat will just eat them no struggle. just gotta make sure not not to forget to give them to them.
customer_reviews.author: Adam richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My dogs and cats love this product! It helps keep their skin, coat shiny and soft. It also promotes overall wellness and boosts their immune system. An added extra bonus is it helps deter fleas and ticks. I keep my pets on this year around!
customer_reviews.author: sheri aston

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM. THEY WORK.
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving these to my dog every morning for the past month. She sheds way less AND my friend slept at my house while she was spraying for fleas in her home.. unfortunately she brought some with her... I got fleas and my dog didnt. HIGHLY RECOMMEND- they last so long too
customer_reviews.author: Sarah wells

customer_reviews.title: None of my pets would eat them.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't know how well they work because I couldn't get my pets to take them. I did force them down all my peers mouths a few days but it was not something I could keep up daily. My cat that eats everything, including kale and strawberries would touch the at all. Wish it would have worked out better.
customer_reviews.author: River

customer_reviews.title: I like the brand
customer_reviews.text: My pup will eat these straight as treats. The bulldog that will eat everything refuses these and wants the treat version. My cat was like. Nope. I want the treat kind also (he tries to steal the treat kind from the dogs!!) it’s made by the same people. These are cheaper so the pups will continue these but the cat will get the baggie of treats one bag lasts three months for just him
customer_reviews.author: Bluecowgirl

customer_reviews.title: They work wonderfully and highly recommend over those expensive drops that are ...
customer_reviews.text: My parents have used this product on their pets for ten plus years. Now I use it on my dog. They work wonderfully and highly recommend over those expensive drops that are laden with chemicals ( I've seen a dog have seizures that was caused by that stuff)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Easy for my dog to take and no fleas!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving my dogs Brewers Yeast and garlic for over 25 years and I've tried them all. I love this brand as it only one pill per 20lbs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Coelsch

customer_reviews.title: Gassy Dog Tablets
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if these did anything for my dog other than make her gassy. She ate them rather willingly. We completed the bottle but then decided not to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRATION DATE
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time purchasing product but DISAPPOINTED that the expiration date is in 6 months. Last time I purchased expiration date was at least 1 year away. One drawback to ordering on-line....you cannot be sure they are sending you fresh merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Denise A. Firth

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had this for awhile and has not worked at all on my dog. Seems like it brought more fleas. Not worth buying she has been off of it for 1 month now and has NO FLEAS OR EGGS, I just shower her twice a month with 1 time bath with dawn and she has not had any problems with fleas so don't buy this because it don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Calsee

customer_reviews.title: Beware what you give to your fur-babies
customer_reviews.text: Well I read the reviews and I thought that it was a good idea to buy this for my babies it so happened that for some reason there were more fleas on them then before they took the pills so I really don't recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: I. M. Flecha

customer_reviews.title: Great for your Cat
customer_reviews.text: Always used breyers yeast with Garllic to give to my pet cat and never had any fleas. the fleas run from the Garlic smell which comes out in their skin.

customer_reviews.title: ok

customer_reviews.title: Garlic smells
customer_reviews.text: Didn't use long enough to know how well it keeps fleas away. My dog hated eating them and his breath and overall stink was so bad I couldn't take it.
customer_reviews.author: ncheggeh

customer_reviews.title: No more fleas!
customer_reviews.text: We have had repeated flea infestations from our neighborhood; we started using your product, and the fleas are now gone. Both our dogs and cats gobble them up.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Helps with the fleas
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be helping keep the fleas off. Have had an occasional tick but we haven't been using it long. I use it on both my cats and dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. Veilleux

customer_reviews.title: Natural effective flea repellent for dogs and cats
customer_reviews.text: Crush up with mort and pestle or hammer/rolling pin and sprinkle this onto your dog/cats food and they will not have fleas anymore! This is our only preventative/flea repellent. Use 1 teaspoon once a day.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it’s for
customer_reviews.text: My dogs and cat love these! I’ve been giving these for a few months now and my pets fur is soooo soft and shiny. And I’m hoping that it is because of these that they haven’t gotten fleas.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved these and thought they were treats! I have two doodles. They both weigh about 60-65 lbs.

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: It has been doing a great job off keeping them flea free but I got 8 dogs and its 1 tablet per 20 lbs . Still working well . One thing all my dogs are sniffling line they got allergies but we just moved so I don't know if this would have anything to do with it .

customer_reviews.title: product works great
customer_reviews.text: The product works great it helps get rid of the fleas

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!

customer_reviews.title: Both dogs take the pills easily, just like other treats

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have a natural flea alternative for my pets
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have a natural flea alternative for my pets. The only problem with these is the coating that 2 of my 3 dogs don't like and it also makes it hard to crumble into their food.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Mcpherrin

customer_reviews.title: POISON
customer_reviews.text: My vet just warned me garlic is extremely toxic to dogs. Don’t give these to your babies.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Beth

customer_reviews.title: Kills fleas.
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing stuff. It kills the damn fleas somehow. I'm thinking that these fleas have sugar in their blood and when they eat the yeast they explode. I sure hope so. I can't imagine how else the yeast stops them. Better than using poison. Organic and safe.
customer_reviews.author: william grey

customer_reviews.title: The best thing we have found for our dog
customer_reviews.text: The best thing we have found for our dog! It's been a great summer for our dog and us! No fleas or ticks! Thank you for this great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: After suffering from a skin irritation from serious flea bite ...
customer_reviews.text: After suffering from a skin irritation from serious flea bite reactions, these tablets healed her skin within 3 days! I use them every day, now as a supplement to ensure she stays healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: The price is great and they love them!
customer_reviews.text: Over all rating of 4stars only because I need to wait to see if they help. But other than that I give the product and service 5stars! My 3 dogs and 1 cat like the smell and taste. I have to push them back after they get their dose. Also at the rate which they go through them, the price is great? Glad I found these.
customer_reviews.author: GHad

customer_reviews.title: Product was delivered promptly. I have just started using ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered promptly. I have just started using it, so I cannot attest to its efficacy as yet. My dogs and cats find it delicious. I will leave another review when I can see the success of the product. I am expecting it to work, from all of the glowing reviews. Update . . . I am now using my third bottle of this product. My dogs and cats love the flavor and I haven't seen a flea yet! So, I intend to continue using this product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rickey L. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: My dog is 110 pounds and I have to give ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 110 pounds and I have to give him 5 pills - wish it was only one or two - I will look around for a product for large dog s with less required dosage for weight , you also will need to use this with other products to combat ticks but works well for fleas -

customer_reviews.title: So I guess they taste good and so far working

customer_reviews.text: It kept fleas off my dogs. Plus helped their skin. They ate it like it was a treat.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything to keep the fleas off my pet. My neighbor recommended this and I reluctantly purchased. My dog is happy to eat these and so far no fleas
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: No fleas
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I'm sold! No fleas after a week or so after using.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Best price on the WEB
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is a natural product. The size of the bottle has 300 tabs in it and for the weight of my 10 lb Maltipoo, she only gets one-half of a tablet daily. Great price for the amount that I get.
customer_reviews.author: slowneasy

customer_reviews.title: I've been using them on our four dogs for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using them on our four dogs for a few months now. I noticed that the fleas seem to be staying away and my dogs coats are shinier. I have 2 poms and two chihuahuas and it seems to do the trick for both.
customer_reviews.author: LCFTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes. Seemed to help my dog's skin problem. Mange is obviously a nutritional deficiency.
customer_reviews.author: tedstera

customer_reviews.title: I use these on my three dogs - helps with ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my three dogs - helps with mosquitos and ticks but you should use more than just this too -

customer_reviews.title: It;s safe to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my dog. Is keeping fleas away, and it's safe. The natural way is the way to go!!!
customer_reviews.author: roxie  angelo

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!!
customer_reviews.text: My three dogs are taking this pills for about three weeks , they like them, no side effects noticed, and it works great combined with the anti-flea collar, in preventing fleas .
customer_reviews.author: easy -amazon

customer_reviews.title: Supplier shipped in a timely matter but the product was ...
customer_reviews.text: Supplier shipped in a timely matter but the product was just meh. I used this for a couple of weeks with no real noticeable effects on fleas. Ended up really zeroing in on vaccumming regularly and dusting with demaecteous earth. Lots of baths with flea shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Loving the result!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs' coats glisten! They don't scratch like they were, and even my picky eater doesn't seem to mind the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Polk

customer_reviews.title: Dog won't eat.
customer_reviews.text: My dog won't eat them voluntarily. I have to hide them in his treats.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for years on my dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this to my dogs for years instead of topical flea and tick treatments. I live in the woods and my current dog has never had a flea or tick. He also has dietary issues and it doesn't bother him. I give it year round.
customer_reviews.author: Designdiva

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen improvement in my bull terriers coat & skin since she's been taking it. Great product. I have recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Only Natural Pet Brewer's Yeast & Garlic
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my cat. He loves them. They are smaller in size than the ones he is used to but he eats this right up. Only 1 for him a day.
customer_reviews.author: Janny

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Dog's coats are shiny and healthy. Haven't had any flea, tick, or mosquito problems.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this to my 3 dogs for a month now. One 2 of them, it seems to be helping alot. It is not working as well on my dachshund. I still give it a Full 4 Stars, due to it helping my other 2 boys :).
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Dog doesn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Must taste different from former brand dog loved. Have to force him to take them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hake

customer_reviews.title: Dogs eat with food. We'll see if they repel fleas next Summer.
customer_reviews.text: The dogs eat them right along with their food. I will update my review next Summer during flea season as to if they keep the fleas away.
customer_reviews.author: TROOBREV

customer_reviews.title: Dogs dont mind it, not sure how much its really doing, cheap enough to keep going
customer_reviews.text: My dogs ate them fine in their food. Didn't seem to do much for my problem child's skin issues, but will keep going until winter sets in for flea and bug control.
customer_reviews.author: Nixy

customer_reviews.title: They have not gotten rid of all the fleas but have minimized them and I am happy with that
customer_reviews.text: Did not bathe or de-flea the dogs prior to use. They have not gotten rid of all the fleas but have minimized them and I am happy with that. Have noticed no ill effects. Most of the dogs like them, save a few finicky ones that require they be wrapped in cheese to take.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: as that’s how we give it to our dog in her food but she seems to really like the flavor of these
customer_reviews.text: Hard to crush up, as that’s how we give it to our dog in her food but she seems to really like the flavor of these!
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: The ferral cat I feed seems to do much better with her skin not being chewed up by fleas
customer_reviews.text: The ferral cat I feed seems to do much better with her skin not being chewed up by fleas. She seems to like the flavor as the tablet is the first thing she eats when I put her food down.
customer_reviews.author: valerie s

product_meta.title: Only Natural Pet Brewer's Yeast & Garlic
product_meta.description: Size:1 BottleOnly Natural Pet Brewer's Yeast & Garlic Dog Cat Supplement, at Only Natural Pet Store, excellent source of protein & B vitamins that help maintain healthy skin & coat. Garlic may act as a flea deterrent.
feature_bullets: Best flea & tick supplement for both dogs and cats with proven results!
Supports your dog and cat's overall health and wellness, immune system, and skin & coat
Proven ingredients like garlic, brewer's yeast, and complex b-vitamins
Completely safe as a supplement for everyday use
Only Natural Pet brand products are 100% Guaranteed!
